title: This cartoony cats vs. dogs RTS asserts that humanity's companions cannot live in harmony
description: War is hell, but also very cute in Warpaws.

title: Have you learned a real-world skill from a game?
description: It's not all fun and games.

title: What if the 1991 Lone Wolf videogame was actually a choose-your-own-adventure book?
description: We're rerunning Richard Cobbett's classic Crapshoot column, in which he rolled the dice and took a chance on obscure games—both good and bad.

title: Disgruntled employee spams players of 14-year-old MMO with profanity-laden official notifications
description: Servers for Wizard101 were temporarily shut down, seemingly in response.

title: Valve's got the real docks for Steam Deck at Tokyo Game Show, have a look
description: Knife fight in the comments over the single USB-C port.

title: The Yakuza series will be called Like a Dragon going forward
description: The series name change brings it in line with the Japanese naming.

title: Elden Ring board game in the works, because of course it is
description: Plus, a look at a Margit, the Fell Omen miniature.

title: One of 2019's best shooters is getting a surprise sequel from a new developer
description: Phantom Fury brings a new, PS2-throwback aesthetic to follow up Ion Fury.

title: Today's Wordle 455 answer and hint: Saturday, September 17
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.
